#!/bin/bash

CHEF_REPO=/tmp/provisioning
CHEF_CLIENT_VERSION="11.18.12"

# Install Chef Client
curl -L https://www.chef.io/chef/install.sh | sudo bash -s -- -v $CHEF_CLIENT_VERSION

# Create required bootstrap dirs/files
sudo mkdir -p $CHEF_REPO/cache $CHEF_REPO/cookbooks

# Pull down Chef 11 compatible cookbook
wget -qO- https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks/chef-server/versions/2.1.6/download | sudo tar xvzC $CHEF_REPO/cookbooks

cd $CHEF_REPO
sudo chef-client -z -o 'chef-server::default'

Properties.GroupDescription: Enable SSH and HTTP access on the inbound port
